headline: Can AppLovin Stock Rebound This Year?
summary: This year, tech company AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) has been hit with multiple short reports questioning the validity of its business model.  Is there a way for AppLovin to turn things around this year, and could it be a great buy on the dip, or should you steer clear of it for now?  Can AppLovin's impressive growth story continue?

headline: 2 Reasons to Like APP (and 1 Not So Much)
summary: AppLovin has been on fire lately. In the past six months alone, the company’s stock price has rocketed 55.1%, reaching $246.54 per share. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
